desc.zh:
1.修复了读取文件时从第二个值开始的问题
2.修复了当有默认值后不显示清除按钮的问题
3.修复了重命名后当文件有多个“.”时文件名显示错误的问题
desc.en:
1. Fixed issue with starting from the second value when reading files
2. Fixed the issue of not displaying the clear button when there is a default value
3. Fixed the issue of incorrect file name display when there are multiple '.' files after renaming

desc.zh:
1.添加了记录上一次使用配置的功能
2.修正了添加文件不能实时更新文件名的bug
desc.en:
1. Added the function of recording the last usage configuration
2. Fixed a bug where adding files cannot update file names in real-time

desc.zh:
1.保留模式添加了以日期命令的功能
2.以日期命名可以指定长度
3.修复了无法获取照片拍摄日期的功能
desc.en:
1. The retention mode has added the function of using date commands
2. Named after a date can specify a length
3. Fixed the function of not being able to obtain photo shooting dates

desc.zh: 添加了前缀和后缀自定义开始数字的功能
desc.en: Added custom prefix and suffix start digit functionality
Fixed a bug with text overflow

desc.zh: 修复了多次使用从小到大排序要点两次的bug
desc.en: Fixed a bug that repeatedly used small to large sorting points twice

desc.zh: 添加了给名称自动排序的功能
desc.en: Added the ability to automatically sort names

desc.zh:
1.保留模式可以自动匹配不同类型的内容
2.长度模式支持匹配中间内容
desc.en:
1. Reserved Mode can automatically match different types of content
2. Length Mode matches the intermediate content

desc.zh: 添加了更多日期命名的类型
